document.full_text: the judge overseeing new york's lawsuit against former american international group inc chief executive hank greenberg denied on monday a motion urging him to quit the case.
document.title: aig ex-ceo greenberg loses bid to change ny judge
lines_and_colors: the judge overseeing new york's lawsuit against former american international group inc chief executive hank greenberg denied on monday a motion urging him to quit the case.
